titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the engrossment of H.R. 1.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the engrossment of H.R. 1.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

vote.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 499, H. Res. 492 is considered passed House.
